div.p: Selectivity of two kinds of quantum dots for different metal ions. F 0 is the fluorescence intensity of the quantum dots; F is the fluorescence intensity when metal ions are added; F/F 0 is the fluorescence quenching efficiency of the quantum dots. ( a) Selectivity of N-CQDs for different metal ions (25 μM); ( b) selectivity of cadmium selenide (CdSe) quantum dots for different metal ions (25 μM).
